place.name: HERODSFOOT
place.gazetteerText: HERODSFOOT, a chapelry in Duloe parish, Cornwall; near West Looe. Pop., 453. The living is a vicarage. Value, £70.* (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
